comments.body: Involves a lot of mathematics especially modular arithmetic. They'll teach you the basics of it don't worry, but overall it's fun to learn. Worth it.
Is it necessary???can we do projects based on this???what about it's importance for placement
Yes it is necessary. Yes you can do projects based on this. Treat this as a subject more than opportunity for placement because there are several other factors involved in placement.
Ayo is it possible for me to dm u personally to know more about the subject....I didn't understand what u mean other factors involved?

Other factors meaning I meant this subject alone won't give you an edge over your placements. If you want to pursue cybersecurity sure you can take up this subject along with computer network security.
